title: ETH Zurich - Wikipedia
snippet: ETH Zurich has two campuses, namely Zentrum and Hönggerberg. The Zentrum campus grew around the main building, which was constructed 1858–1864 outside and right above the eastern border of the town, but which is nowadays located right in the heart of the city.

title: Campus | ETH Zurich
snippet: Like the sound of studying and researching close to Zurich’s old town? Working with a view of the Alps? ETH Zurich's locations are distinguished by their prominent position and are easily accessible by public transport.

title: ETH Zurich : Rankings, Fees & Courses Details | TopUniversities
snippet: For undergraduates the main teaching ... largest city, ETH Zurich has two main locations: in downtown Zurich and on a modern campus built on a hill in the outskirts of the town....

title: Zentrum campus | ETH Zurich
snippet: The ETH main building in the centre of Zurich not only embodies tradition. The Zentrum campus with its numerous surrounding buildings is also a lively meeting and study location.
